./

blakeflow__define.pro


Flow field at specified points due to a stokeslet near a horizontal wall in the plane $z = 0$.

Reference: J. R. Blake, "A note on the image system for a stokeslet in a no-slip boundary," Proc. Cambridge Phil. Soc. 70, 303-310 (1971).

Author information

Author

David G. Grier, New York University

Copyright

Copyright (c) 2015 David G. Grier
